alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:38PM EDT until July 13 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN WAYNE AND NORTHWESTERN PIKE COUNTIES... At 638 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lake Ariel, or 9 miles southwest of Honesdale, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Honesdale, Paupack, South Canaan, Hawley, Tresslarville, Lake Ariel, Arlington, Headley, Lakeville and Kimbles. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
